text: Sound Horizon is a Japanese musical group. They released their first major album in 2004 with Elysion ~Rakuen e no Zens≈çkyoku~. This album started as the number 14 most popular in Japan. They call themselves a "fantasy band". The band members change according to the song. The composer, Revo is the only person who always participates in the band. Category:Japanese rock bands Category:Progressive metal bands Category:Folk music groups
title: Sound Horizon
